amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving oral health care for children and pregnant women under Medicaid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 364 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 364 proposed by Senator Cardin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 364 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 364 proposed by Senator Cardin.
